results.question: A numeric ranking of a task's importance and appropriateness for leveling is called ________.
A better approach to scheduling tasks is to use a deadline date rather than a(n) ________.
When you link the tasks in a project schedule, you establish a(n) ________ between the tasks.
________ is the process of delaying a resource's work on a task to resolve an overallocation.
Microsoft Project honors constraint dates over task relationships, even if this causes ________.
Tasks with a priority of ________ are leveled first.
When you enter a deadline date, Microsoft Project alerts you if the task's ________ moves beyond the deadline.
A(n) ________ is a value you enter for a task that indicates the latest date by which you want the task to be completed.
The default task priority value for all tasks is ________.
Tasks with a priority of ________ are never delayed by leveling.
Microsoft Project uses __________ to determine which tasks can be delayed in order to resolve periods of resource overallocation.
Which of the following is the numeric ranking range for task priority?
Entering a deadline date has no effect on the scheduling of a summary or subtask, except when the task involves which of the following?
Which of the following is not a semi‐flexible constraint?
Depending on options you choose, resource leveling might __________.
incorrect_answers: delay the start date of a specific resource's assignment
delay the start date of an entire task
split up the work on a task

results.question: Which of the following must be done to remove a deadline from a task?
results.correct_answer: Clear the Deadline field on the Advanced tab of the Task Information dialog box.
incorrect_answers: Delete the deadline indicator from the bar chart portion of the Gantt chart.
Slide the deadline indicator off of the active portion of the Gantt chart.

results.question: Which of the following is not a type of task relationship?
A deadline date __________.
incorrect_answers: is the due date of the project
is not indicated on the Gantt chart

results.question: Which of the following allows the most flexibility in scheduling a task?
By default, Microsoft Project honors which of the following?
